backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling authorization, user profiles, card listings, and order requests with CRUD operations and access control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old order requests to the new format by adding optional offerPrice and message fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs related to order request enhancements and admin UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files covering pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including light/dark theme CSS variables and base rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root app container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuration using TanStack Router with public and admin routes wrapped in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminListi: Admin panel listing sellerâ€™s items with create-listing dialog, status badges, and mark-as-sold actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Admin panel displaying and filtering order requests with offer/message data and status update controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateList: Dialog component for creating a new card listing with form fields and submission logic using useCreateListing.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and displays appropriate button states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Initial profile setup dialog allowing users to submit their name using useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicFoo: Renders the public site footer with attribution and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicHea: Header with navigation, branding, and login controls for public pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/store/ListingCar: Displays a card listing preview with image, price, condition, and sold state, linking to listing details.
frontend/src/components/store/OrderReque: Form for users to submit purchase requests or offers for a listing, handling auth and submission states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for admin checks, fetching the caller's profile, and saving profile updates via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useListings.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching active and seller listings and mutating listing data such as creating or marking listings sold.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequests.ts: Implements hooks for querying seller order requests and creating or updating order request records via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page with tabbed panels for managing listings and order requests, including navigation and login button.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout enforcing authentication and admin checks, handling loading and unauthorized states, and optionally showing profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a single listing, handling loading, errors, sold state, and rendering an order request form.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Renders the storefront with search and condition filters and displays active listings with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for a sports card marketplace application.
